articles.author: Sam Tabahriti
articles.title: Musk's dad says he's been asked to donate sperm to create 'more Elons'
articles.description: Errol Musk told The Sun he has been approached by a South American company to donate his sperm and said: "Well, why not?"
articles.content:
Elon Musk's father has claimed he was approached by an unnamed South American company to donate sperm to create more people like his son.
The 76-year-old told The Sun: "I've got a company in Colombi… [+2003 chars]

articles.title: World Health Organization says monkeypox outbreak a global emergency
articles.description: The WHO declared the monkeypox outbreak, which has been detected in over 70 countries, an "extraordinary event"— requiring a unified global response.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization on Saturday declared the monkeypox outbreak, which has spread to over 70 countries, a global health emergency.

articles.title: Abortion is a Jewish right and a rabbi says hers was a blessing
articles.description: Rabbi Rachael Pass told Insider that her study of Jewish texts helped her see her abortion as honoring the religious tenant of bodily autonomy.

articles.title: Income-based student-loan repayment was bad 'from the very beginning': worker
articles.description: "We didn't even want to tell people about loan forgiveness ... because we knew how unlikely it would be for them to get it," the worker told Insider.

articles.content:
